name.baseName: Brick production ; sintered bricks ; sintering process
砖生产;烧结砖;烧结工艺

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The described industrial process is for the production of sintered bricks, utilizing Water-Based Drilling Cuttings (WDC) as a substitute for natural clay. The sintered bricks produced are suitable for construction purposes, offering an environmentally friendly alternative by recycling industrial waste and reducing the consumption of water and natural clay resources.
所描述的工业过程用于生产烧结砖，采用水基钻屑（WDC）替代天然粘土。所生产的烧结砖适用于建筑用途，通过循环利用工业废弃物并减少自然粘土资源和水资源的消耗，提供了一种环保替代品。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: 1t WDC were chosen as the functional unit

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: WDC（water-based drilling cuttings） were used as a replacement for natural clay to prepare sintered bricks. The water content of the WDC can be reduced from 80% to 20% through press filter pretreatment, which can meet the requirements of external delivery for recycling. The remaining water in the WDC can be used directly to make bricks (240 mm × 115 mm × 53 mm) to reduce the consumption of water resources. The entire production process includes raw material preparation, mixing, pressing, drying and sintering (temperature of 800–1000 °C; time for 1-4 h)
WDC（水基钻屑） 用于替代天然粘土制备烧结砖。通过压滤机预处理，WDC 的含水量可从 80% 降至 20%，从而满足对外交付的循环利用要求。WDC 中剩余的水可直接用于制砖（240 毫米 × 115 毫米 × 53 毫米），以减少水资源的消耗。整个生产过程包括原料制备、混合、压制、干燥和烧结（温度为 800-1000 ℃；时间为 1-4 h）。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The described industrial process is for the production of sintered bricks, utilizing Water-Based Drilling Cuttings (WDC) as a substitute for natural clay. The sintered bricks produced are suitable for construction purposes, offering an environmentally friendly alternative by recycling industrial waste and reducing the consumption of water and natural clay resources.
所描述的工业过程用于生产烧结砖，采用水基钻屑（WDC）替代天然粘土。所生产的烧结砖适用于建筑用途，通过循环利用工业废弃物并减少自然粘土资源和水资源的消耗，提供了一种环保替代品。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: The eFootprint online analysis platform developed by IKE Environmental Technology Co. was used to perform quantitative analysis of the full life cycle process, as part of the LCA
作为生命周期评估的一部分，亿科环境技术有限公司开发的 eFootprint 在线分析平台用于对整个生命周期过程进行定量分析。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The foreground data of raw materials, energy input, and exhaust emissions were obtained from a case study enterprise in Zigong (Sichuan, China), Chuangqi Environmental Protection Building Materials Co., Ltd., which has undertaken the utilization project of WDC used as a raw material for sintered bricks, with an annual output of 30 million bricks.
原材料、能源投入和废气排放的原始数据来自自贡（中国四川）的一家案例研究企业--创奇环保建材有限公司，该公司承担了烧结砖原材料 WDC 的利用项目，年产 3000 万块烧结砖。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Liu, W. et al. Comparative life cycle assessment of cement, sintered bricks and non-sintered bricks manufacturing using water-based drilling cuttings from shale gas production in the Sichuan Basin, China. J. Environ. Manage. 314, 115135 (2022).

Liu, W. et al. Comparative life cycle assessment of cement, sintered bricks and non-sintered bricks manufacturing using water-based drilling cuttings from shale gas production in the Sichuan Basin, China. J. Environ. Manage. 314, 115135 (2022).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.samplingProcedure: Besides, 1t WDC were chosen as the functional unit and all the input parameters of raw materials, auxiliary materials, energy consumption, transportation, and direct emissions were calculated in accordance with the functional unit.
此外，选择 1t WDC 作为功能单位，并按照功能单位计算所有原材料、辅助材料、能耗、运输和直接排放的输入参数。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing the dataset for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA), adopt the functional unit of 1 ton of WDC to quantify inputs such as raw materials, auxiliary materials, energy, transportation, and emissions in accordance with this unit. Apply the cut-off rule as per Zhao et al., 2020, disregarding upstream materials of less than 1% weight of the final product, like fly ash, from the inventory. Integrate these data into the eFootprint platform for a comprehensive analysis of the environmental impact during the brick's life cycle.
在使用数据集进行生命周期评估（LCA）时，采用 1 吨 WDC 作为功能单位，根据此单位量化原材料、辅助材料、能耗、运输和排放等输入参数。按照 Zhao 等人，2020年的规定应用截断规则，从清单中忽略重量不足最终产品 1% 的上游材料，如粉煤灰。将这些数据整合到 eFootprint 平台中，对砖石生命周期环境影响进行全面分析。

completeness.common:other: The cut-off rule was adopted, meaning that low-value materials from upstream processes weighing less than 1% of the final product (Zhao et al., 2020), such as fly ash, could be ignored in the inventory.
采用了截断规则，这意味着在清单中可以忽略来自上游工序、重量不到最终产品 1%的低价值材料（Zhao 等人，2020 年），如粉煤灰。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
